question: Who is the first cricketer to score 3,000 runs in T-20 International matches?
explanation:
India menâ€™s cricket team captain Virat Kohli has become the first-ever batsman to score 3,000 runs in T-20 International.
Virat Kohli achieved the milestone during the second T20-International against England at Ahmedabad. Virat has achieved the feat from 87 T20 international matches. He is followed by New Zealand's Martin Guptill at second place and Rohit Sharma in 3rd place.
